doc:
Claire Anderson https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Claire_Anderson 0 Claire Mathis Anderson (May 8, 1891 – March 23, 1964) was a silent film actress who worked with stars such as Constance Talmadge, Harry Carey and Thurston Hall. She was described as one of the original Sennett Bathing Beauties. Ms. Anderson appeared in the 1944 production of Mexican Hayride at the Winter Garden Theatre in New York City. Claire_Mathis_Anderson ( May_8_,_1891 – March_23_,_1964 ) was a_silent_film_actress who worked with stars such_as Constance_Talmadge , Harry_Carey and Thurston_Hall . She was_described as one of the_original_Sennett_Bathing_Beauties . Ms._Anderson appeared in the_1944_production of Mexican_Hayride at the_Winter_Garden_Theatre in New_York_City .
